entries.aiming: Aiming increases the chances of successfully hitting a target.
entries.alert: A meditative state used to focus powerful inner energies.
entries.berserk: When someone is berserk, they hit harder but get hit more often.
entries.bleeding: Bleeding can adversely affect various stat pools.  It can be stopped if a medic successfully applies First Aid.
entries.blinded: While blinded, combat accuracy falls dramatically.
entries.blocking: Blocking - Cut - Please bug report this string if seen in game.
entries.combat: This displays if a player, NPC, or creature is in combat.
entries.cover: Cover gives a defensive bonus and allows the use of Surprise Shot.  It makes its benefactor immobile unless they have Sneak.
entries.diseased: Disease can cause wounds to various attributes, and generally causes these wounds slowly.  It can be cured if a doctor successfully uses Cure Disease medicines.
entries.dizzy: Being dizzy makes it possible to fall down when changing postures.
entries.driving: Driving a vehicle limits what additional actions you can attempt.
entries.feigndeath: A feigned death can trick enemies into believing that their target is really dead.
entries.frozen: When one is frozen, they are unable to run or walk.
entries.immobilized: When one is immobilized, they are unable to run or walk.
entries.intimidated: Those who are intimidated do not hit as often.
entries.maskscent: A masked scent may prevent aggressive creatures from attacking players who approach them.
entries.onfire: Fire!!  This quickly damages stat pools while also creating wound damage.
entries.peace: Peace shows that somebody has ceased hostilities towards their combat target.
entries.pilotingpobship: Piloting a ship allows space travel and combat.
entries.pilotingship: Piloting a ship allows space travel and combat.
entries.poisoned: Poison can adversely affect various stat pools, and causes its damage rather quickly.  It can be cured if a doctor successfully uses Cure Poison medicine.
entries.rallied: Rallied is a group-wide bonus to hit percentage.
entries.ridingmount: Riding a mount limits what additional actions you can attempt.
entries.shipgunner: Manning a weapon on a starship.
entries.shipoperations: While using the Ship Operations station, a pilot can execute special abilities and droid programs.
entries.sneaking: Sneaking allows you to slowly move around while Taking Cover.
entries.stunned: The stunned state takes away a round of combat and temporarily lowers some stats.
entries.swimming: Swimming allows you to wade through deep water.
entries.tef: A Temporary Enemy Flag is acquired when you perform an action which temporarily makes you an enemy of some faction.
entries.tumbling: Tumbling gives a defensive bonus to whoever is in that state.
entries.disguised: While disguised, you may be able to move around certain enemies unnoticed.
entries.electricburned: You are currently being damaged by an electric attack!
entries.coldburned: You are currently being damaged by a cold attack!
entries.acidburned: You are currently being damaged by an acid attack!
entries.energyburned: You are currently being damaged by an energy attack!
entries.kineticburned: You are currently being damaged by a kinetic attack!
